title: My phone won't charge at all
content: My phone won't charge at all. Infact, it would switch off as soon as I remove the charger. I opened the battery section in settings, but it says "unable to read your battery status". The phone itself has become very very slow, and nothing seems to be working smoothly. I had buy another phone due to this emergency. Please help
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
